original_title: Quem Me Dera Em Vez De Uma Câmara Ter Uma Mosca
overview: A trip of the director with her camera through the city. It’s a movie about cinema and the people that are in it, trapped. It’s like a box where the director keeps the objects of her life, her story and her anxiety, almost without opening it, a movie to be made, surrounded by fear. There is her family lying in a garden of nails, the womb, the city where at any moment, by chance, you can meet a monster.
title: I Wish Instead of a Camera I Had a Fly
